name: TocTocToe
description:
A tic-tac-toe variant where both players use Only One symbol: The noughts!

Rules
  • You (orange) and the AI put O's on the boards.
  • When three O's are in a line the board is locked.
  • Whoever locks the last board looses the game.

Press the AI button if you want to play with a local friend.

Made with Unreal Engine 4. Runs best in Firefox or Chrome.

Voting should open soon: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2019/rate/460609
